CustomField.description: Current ramp status: Ramping (0-6 months), Mature (6+ months or hit $2M milestone)
CustomField.formula: IF(Is_Ramped__c, "Mature - Hit Milestone", IF(Months_Since_Start__c >= 6, "Mature - 6+ Months", IF(Months_Since_Start__c >= 3, "Ramping - Month " & TEXT(CEILING(Months_Since_Start__c)), "Ramping - Early" )))
CustomField.label: Ramp Status
